valhelsia.chat.first_start_message: Welcome to Valhelsia 5! We have friendly Discord community to chat, offer help and support, and share pics and videos.
valhelsia.chat.discord_link: You're more than welcome to join us.§r
valhelsia.chat.wiki: Looking for an FAQ or other information about the modpack?
valhelsia.chat.last_start_message: Thanks for playing! We hope you enjoy exploring the worlds of Valhelsia!§r
item.valhelsia.steamed_ham.lore: It might not be a burger, but it makes for an unforgettable luncheon.
tetra.variant_category.rod.label: Rod
valhelsia.tooltip.how_get_jade: This gemstone can be found in Jungle biomes.
valhelsia.tooltip.backpack: Contains 27 inventory slots and 1 upgrade slot.
valhelsia.tooltip.iron_backpack: Contains 27 inventory slots and 2 upgrade slots.
valhelsia.tooltip.gold_backpack: Contains 27 inventory slots and 3 upgrade slots.
valhelsia.tooltip.diamond_backpack: Contains 27 inventory slots and 5 upgrade slots.
valhelsia.tooltip.netherite_backpack: Contains 27 inventory slots and 7 upgrade slots.
valhelsia.information.minecraft.crafting: Firework stars are craftable with Gunpowder, any Dye, and optional Effect items (see the Minecraft Wiki).
valhelsia.information.minecraft.glow_ber: Glow Berries can be crafted into Glow Berry Pips in order to be able to plant them.
valhelsia.information.minecraft.sweet_be: Sweet Berries can be crafted into Sweet Berry Pips in order to be able to plant them.
valhelsia.information.akashictome.filled: Crafting an Akashic Tome using four bookshelves will provide one filled with the starting manuals. The recipe that uses one bookshelf will be empty.
valhelsia.information.akashictome.revert: Right-click to select a book to read. Left-click in the air to revert the tome back to select a new book.
valhelsia.information.atmospheric.aloe_k: Aloe Kernels can be planted on either Arid Sand or Red Arid Sand. When planted on Arid Sand they will grow Yellow Blossoms, and when on Red Arid Sand they instead grow faster.
valhelsia.information.atmospheric.yellow: Aloe Kernels that are planted on Red Arid Sand will eventually grow into Tall Aloe Vera, which blooms with Yellow Blossoms.
valhelsia.information.autumnity.sap_bott: Sap Bottles are created by right-clicking with a Glass Bottle on a Sappy Maple block. Sappy Maple blocks have a 25% chance to be created when stripping Autumnity Maple Logs or Wood with an axe.
valhelsia.information.autumnity.sappy_ma: Sappy Maple Logs have a 25% chance to be created when stripping Autumnity Maple Logs. Right-clicking on Sappy Maple Log with a Glass Bottle will fill the bottle with sap.
Sappy Maple Wood has a 25% chance to be created when stripping Autumnity Maple Wood. Right-clicking on Sappy Maple Wood with a Glass Bottle will fill the bottle with sap.
valhelsia.information.autumnity.snail_go: Landing on a Snail Goo Block does not cause fall damage unless the player is sneaking.
Snail Goo Blocks cause movement on top of them to slow down unless they are touching water or a wet sponge, in which case they become slippery. Snails are not affected by snail goo blocks.
Entities that are touching the bottom of a non-slippery snail goo block will stick to the block, preventing them from falling. This does not apply to snails or entities that are sneaking.
Snail Goo Blocks act similarly to Slime Blocks and Honey Blocks when moved by a piston, but additionally won't stick to either Mulberry Jam Blocks or Aloe Gel Blocks
valhelsia.information.botania.ender_air_: Right-click with an empty bottle while in The End to fill it with Ender Air.
valhelsia.information.farmersdelight.ric: Rice can be grown by planting it on dirt that is in shallow water, rather than regular farmland.
valhelsia.information.farmersrespite.cof: Coffee Beans can be grown on top of Basalt. They feed on nearby non-coffee crops.
Deorum can be grown by planting Golden Orchid Seeds on Magical Farmland.
Fungyss is sold by Wandering Traders.
Fungyss can be planted on top of Diorite and then grown with Bone Meal.
Farmland can be converted into Magical Farmland with Arcane Bone Meal.
Obtained by breaking Stella Arcanum without Silk Touch.
Can be found growing in Flower Forests.
valhelsia.information.neapolitan.banana_: A banana frond needs to be planted on Sand or Gravel to grow, and will only grow in the rain.
valhelsia.information.sullysmod.obtainin: Jade can be found underground in Jungle biomes.
valhelsia.information.valhelsia_tweaks.c: Candy can be obtained only around Halloween time.
valhelsia.information.xercapaint.craftin: Palettes are crafted with three planks at the bottom of the crafting grid, and any combination of dyes.
valhelsia.information.xercapaint.adding_: More dyes can be added later by crafting a palette with any missing dye.
valhelsia.tip.abacus: Need to measure the distance between two blocks? Craft an Abacus to help!
valhelsia.tip.jade: Looking for Jade? Search underground in Jungle biomes.
valhelsia.tip.carryon: You can pick up many mobs and blocks by sneaking and right-clicking with both hands empty.
valhelsia.tip.magical_farmland: Farmland can be upgraded to Magical Farmland by using Arcane Bone Meal on it.
valhelsia.tip.trowel: The Trowel will place a random block from your hotbar when used, making it great for building with block variations!
valhelsia.tip.snail: You can find snails in autumnal biomes, and they love all things mushroom!
valhelsia.tip.cockroach: Did you know that cockroaches enjoy percussion and fancy hats?
valhelsia.tip.natures_compass: Searching for a specific biome? Craft a Nature's Compass to find it!
valhelsia.tip.cardboard_box: Want to move things such as spawners over a long distance? Box it up in a cardboard box for easy transport.
valhelsia.tip.tetra: Craft a hammer from the Tetra mod and use it on a spare Crafting Table to start modifying your tools.
valhelsia.tip.gavel: A Blacksmith Gavel gains an additional 30% chance to get extra items from breaking down ore. Stacks with Fortune!
valhelsia.tip.heat_generator: A Heat Generator surrounded by lava is a very cheap passive energy source. You can also lava-log the generator itself!
valhelsia.tip.minecolonies_start: If you're interested in starting MineColonies, search around for a large flat biome such as Plains for an easier time building.
valhelsia.tip.bears: You can tame bears if you have both honey and salmon. They make for a sturdy mount that can even fight for you!
valhelsia.tip.animal_dictionary: Take a look at the Animal Dictionary to learn more about much of the wildlife in the game.
valhelsia.tip.eternal_stella: You can make your gear indestructible by using Eternal Stella on it.
valhelsia.tip.flower_forest: If you find yourself in a Flower Forest, consider picking up Yellow Orchids and Aurum Saplings, both unique to the biome.
valhelsia.tip.xp_bottling: Want to store experience levels easily? Right-click on an Enchanting Table with a Glass Bottle!
valhelsia.tip.black_hole: A Black Hole can convert experience orbs into item form - great for a mob farm.
valhelsia.tip.tea: Fancy a cup of tea? Try searching for a Swamp biome for the seeds.
valhelsia.tip.coffee: Looking for a caffeine hit? Coffee beans grow naturally in Basalt Deltas in the Nether, and only grow on Basalt.
valhelsia.tip.shrines: Search out elemental shrines in the world for useful boons that last until you die.
valhelsia.tip.chisel: A chisel can make interesting new variants of most vanilla Minecraft blocks.
valhelsia.tip.effortless_building: Build faster with Effortless Building! Hold Left-Alt (default keybind) to select a mode.
valhelsia.tip.locked_drawers: Holding a Drawer Key in your offhand while placing Storage Drawers will automatically lock them.
valhelsia.tip.strawberry_altitude: Strawberries may grow differently at high enough altitudes, right near the top of the world.
valhelsia.tip.chairs: Sitting in a chair? A comparator can detect that! Too lazy to stand up? Send a redstone signal to the chair!
valhelsia.tip.crocodiles: If a crocodile comes for you, blocking an attack with your shield will stun it for a few seconds!
valhelsia.tip.platypus: Need some clay? Try handing some redstone to a platypus.
valhelsia.tip.terrapin: Jumping on a Terrapin twice in a row will unleash your inner Italian plumber.
valhelsia.tip.banana_slug: Banana Slug Slime is useful for building underwater.
valhelsia.tip.seal_bartering: Did you know you can barter with seals? They can even give you sponges!
valhelsia.tip.raccoons: While raccoons might steal food from your chests, they'll also steal items from villagers.
valhelsia.tip.blue_jay: If you feed a Blue Jay some Glow Berries, then some to a Raccoon, the two will pair up together!
valhelsia.tip.flute: A Flute will summon your pets directly to you.
valhelsia.tip.compass_sign_post: Using a Compass on a Sign Post will cause the Sign Post to face the direction the Compass is pointing in.
valhelsia.tip.quantum_catcher: A Quantum Catcher can capture most mobs inside, making them easy to transport.
valhelsia.tip.ender_pearl_dispenser: Have you ever wondered what would happen if a Dispenser fires an Ender Pearl? Try it!
valhelsia.tip.bubble_blower: A Bubble Blower enchanted with Stasis is both a load of fun and also useful for building in mid-air!
valhelsia.tip.bundle: Bundles are great to craft early on to keep your inventory clear.
valhelsia.tip.quiver: You can use a Quiver to store multiple stacks of arrows in one slot, and switch between which ones to fire.
valhelsia.tip.bison_fur: A block of Bison Fur can be combined with any boots in a crafting grid to allow you to walk over Powder Snow safely.
valhelsia.tip.zombie_variants: Zombie variants have a chance to drop modded ingots when killed by a player.
valhelsia.tip.wandering_traders: Wandering Traders are well stocked with exotic items, including some unique ones.
valhelsia.tip.koi: Hostile mobs won't spawn when Koi fish are around. You'll feel serenity when close enough.
valhelsia.tip.banana_fronds: Banana Fronds grow when planted on gravel or sand, but only when it rains.
valhelsia.tip.crow_taming: Crows are particularly fond of pumpkin seeds, but wild ones won't take them directly by hand.
valhelsia.tip.insomnia: Tired* of staying awake for nights on end for Phantoms to spawn? Brew up a Potion of Insomnia! (* see what I did there?)
valhelsia.tip.schematicannon: The Schematicannon can build for you! Create a new schematic with a Schematic And Quill.
valhelsia.tip.luminescent_bubble: Luminescent Bubbles drastically increase your swim speed in an area around them. Great for underwater roads!
valhelsia.tip.true_darkness: Too dark at night or in caves? You can disable True Darkness in the Video Settings menu, under Extras.
valhelsia.comment.xali: -----Removing food tooltips from Xali resource pack-----
effect.seasonals.rooted.description: Hunger and Saturation fills up and the player heals due to natural regeneration. Once the effect ends the player loses all hunger and saturation rapidly. While the effect is active, no food can be consumed.
effect.seasonals.stuffed.description: Gives 100% Knockback Resistance and Bonus Armor, but prevents jumping.
enchantment.deeperdarker.catalysis.descr: Slain mobs spread sculk as though a catalyst were nearby.
enchantment.deeperdarker.sculk_smite.des: Deal increased damage to sculk mobs.
